  P(B=True) = 0.4454

  Belief in 'False' increased by 0.1731
  Belief in 'True' decreased by 0.1731
  Largest overall per-state shift: 0.1731.
Evidence impact (leave-one-out):

  => Most influential evidence: E (by L1 contribution)."}

Thus, observing E provides information about B.
